commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: U-Um! There's something I want to talk to you about. Do you mind if I head over to your place right now?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I'm sorry. I've actually got plans today as well...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Again, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. I'm sorry I keep declining all of your invitations lately.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, I see... It is what it is, I guess.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'll totally make up for all of this!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Okay, I'm looking forward to it.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* See ya.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Okay. Later!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: She's busy again today, huh? But this is all pretty much going like I thought. I know she's gonna head out somewhere now!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But I wonder if tailing her is going a bit too far?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: No, it definitely isn't! I'm really curious about what she's getting up to.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I gotta find out the truth today!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Sigh* I didn't do right by Ayumu.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I don't know why, but I feel like someone's been watching me this whole time. Like right now, from behind!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nobody's there. Is this all in my head? Ah well. I gotta get a move on.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Sorry to keep you waiting. Today I'd like to talk about the next live show...

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Wait!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Who is this person? Is this who you've been seeing every week?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A-Ayumu?! What are you doing here?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: More importantly, is this person a school idol as well?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? What?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, I see how it is. You've been working with a new school idol behind our backs and—

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Wait, whaaaa?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, have you calmed down now?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Y-Yeah. I just got a little startled because I wasn't expecting anyone to ask to shake my hand.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That person is the president of your fan club. That's why she got so excited over getting to meet the real you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And let's not forget that startled look on your face! Bahaha!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A-Aww, come on! Don't laugh at me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I'm sorry. Anyway, now that you've calmed down, let me explain everything from the top.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Remember what you said the other day? You said you wanted to do something to bring more joy to your fan club members, right?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Right.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So Nico took me to a school idol live show that she likes for some inspiration.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I've also been talking to lots of different people, like your fan club president just now, to get some ideas.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You've been doing all of that...for me?

commands.select_args: ||For you and for your fan club members.|| select_2

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup. All for you, Ayumu. I mean, I want you to perform the most wonderful live show you ever have before, after all.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's what you were up to? I had no idea.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Giggle* Thank goodness. I was kinda worried.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: For you and your fan club members, I guess.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're incredible, you know that? Not only are you going to such efforts for me, but you also have all of my supportive fans in mind as well.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: But you should've told me that's what you were up to.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was gonna tell you about it once I had a better idea of what I wanted to do. It looks like I actually ended up making you worry about me instead. Sorry.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Don't be! It's okay, especially now that I know you were doing all of this for me.
